# [Interview #1155: Calamity-Philadelphia, PA, Entry #74](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1155#74)

#### Question

Are the Bands of Mourning as Invested as Nightblood?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Not even close.
